name: A pair of blood-streaked clavicles
data: It decreases the users strength adequately.
It increases the users dexterity adequately.
It increases the users constitution adequately.
It increases the users intelligence adequately.
It has poor armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration somewhat.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration poorly.
This item loses its magical powers extremely fast.
